resources.string: No more hassle with complicated financial records, BISA will make it easy for you to plan and control your merchant\'s finances!
With just a few clicks, you can create QR codes that can be used for various purposes, such as payments or orders!
User data security is our top priority. You can use BISA with peace of mind, knowing that your personal data won\'t be stolen or misused!

How to withdraw BISA Merchant balance to a bank account?
To withdraw BISA Merchant balance to a bank account, you can follow these steps:

Bisa Merchant provides various promotional and marketing programs to help increase your business exposure, such as referral programs, cashback, and special promotions for Bisa users.

However, for promotional collaborations with Bisa, you need to contact the Bisa Merchant support team and submit a desired promotional collaboration proposal. The Bisa Merchant team will review your proposal and provide a response.

Make sure to prepare a well-structured collaboration proposal that meets the requirements set by Bisa Merchant, and explain the expected benefits and advantages of the collaboration. Feel free to contact the Bisa Merchant support team if you need assistance or further information regarding promotional collaborations with Bisa Merchant.

No, merchant balance transfers from Bisa Merchant can only be made to a bank account in your name as the account owner. This is to ensure security and prevent unauthorized use of the account.\n\nMake sure you have entered correct and valid bank account information in the Bisa Merchant system and always double-check transaction details before transferring the balance to your bank account for security and smooth transaction process. If you encounter any issues or have further questions, do not hesitate to contact the Bisa Merchant support team.
Can I transfer my merchant balance to someone else\'s bank account?

Yes, you can receive payments from other applications when you become a merchant on Bisa Merchant. However, ensure that the application supports integration with Bisa Merchant as one of the payment options.

To enable payment acceptance from other applications, you need to enter your bank account details into the Bisa Merchant system and activate the payment option according to the instructions provided by Bisa Merchant.

Make sure to check the compatibility and requirements of the other application you want to use for accepting payments, and ensure that the information provided in the Bisa Merchant system is accurate and correct for a smooth payment acceptance process. If you encounter any difficulties, feel free to contact the Bisa Merchant support team for assistance and further information.
Can I receive payments from other applications?

The approval process for a merchant account in Bisa Merchant usually takes one to two business days to review and approve new merchant accounts. However, this time may vary depending on various factors such as the volume of applications to be processed by the Bisa Merchant team and the completeness of the documents you provide.

Ensure that you have completed all the required documents and information requested by Bisa Merchant, and meet the requirements set to become a merchant. This will expedite the approval process of your account.

If you experience any delays in the account approval process, do not hesitate to contact the Bisa Merchant support team for assistance and further information.
How long does the approval process for my merchant account take?
1. Log in to your BISA Merchant account and select the \'Withdraw\' menu.
2. Enter the amount and bank account information such as the bank name and account number.
3. After the information has been verified, click the \'Withdraw\' button and wait for the withdrawal process to complete.
The balance will be directly transferred to the bank account you selected.

Make sure you meet the withdrawal requirements set by BISA Merchant to ensure a smooth withdrawal process. If you encounter any issues or difficulties in withdrawing the balance, feel free to contact the BISA Merchant support team for further assistance.
Rest assured, your account is secure!
If you have any issues with your BISA Merchant account, let us help you
